remarks: The orthocomplement of an element covered by 1 is an atom.  (Contributed by NM, 7-May-2012.)
statement:
1cvrco.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
1cvrco.u $e |- .1. = ( 1. ` K ) $.
1cvrco.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
1cvrco.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
1cvrco.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
1cvrco $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( X C .1. <-> ( ._|_ ` X ) e. A ) ) $.
